text: I also just started using Action1. What is the policy you use to check for updates daily? A script? Janis A. Spencer Network Operations Analyst California State University, Monterey Bay 100 Campus Center, Bldg 43 Seaside, CA 93955 (831) 582-4199 http://it.csumb.edu
